section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents the person or thing, other than a patient, that is the subject of a healthcare activity. For example, the subject might be a research animal, an environmental sample, or a foodstuff sample for food safety testing.

stentry.p: Pointer to the Person or Animal or Thing (e.g., a soil sample) that is the subject of the Order.
Contains other Subjects to which this Subject is related.
